page.title: 18SOCIAL CONCERNS (continued)
page.content:
UNEMPLOYMENT When children leave school at 16,no matter what qualifications,they find it difficult to get a job.Computers take over lots of jobs that people used to do.There are a lot of young people with nothing to do.Some get on training schemes or go to the college, but some cause trouble like vandalism.
POLLUTION This is a problem near the motorway. Noise is very bad and they have put up high wooden fences to try and stop it. There are a lot of fumes from the cars and lorries as well.
